an3.63:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena venagapuram nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
an3.63:1.3: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito venagapuram anuppatto.
an3.63:1.4: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an3.63:1.5: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an3.63:1.6: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
an3.63:1.7: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an3.63:1.8: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
an3.63:2.1: Atha kho venagapurika brahmanagahapatika yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva appekacce bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu, appekacce bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu, sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu, appekacce yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva ekamantam nisidimsu, appekacce namagottam savetva ekamantam nisidimsu, appekacce tunhibhuta ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinno kho venagapuriko vacchagotto brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.63:3.2: Yavancidam bhoto gotamassa vippasannani indriyani, parisuddho chavivanno pariyodato.
an3.63:3.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, saradam badarapandum parisuddham hoti pariyodatam;
an3.63:3.4: evamevam bhoto gotamassa vippasannani indriyani parisuddho chavivanno pariyodato.
an3.63:3.5: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, talapakkam sampati bandhana pamuttam parisuddham hoti pariyodatam;
an3.63:3.6: evamevam bhoto gotamassa vippasannani indriyani parisuddho chavivanno pariyodato.
an3.63:3.7: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nekkham jambonadam dakkhakammaraputtasuparikammakatam ukkamukhe sukusalasampahattham pandukambale nikkhittam bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca;
an3.63:3.8: evamevam bhoto gotamassa vippasannani indriyani parisuddho chavivanno pariyodato.
an3.63:3.9: Yani tani, bho gotama, uccasayanamahasayanani, seyyathidam—
an3.63:3.10: asandi pallanko gonako cittako patika patalika tulika vikatika uddalomi ekantalomi kattissam koseyyam kuttakam hatthattharam assattharam rathattharam ajinappaveni kadalimigapavarapaccattharanam sauttaracchadam ubhatolohitakupadhanam, evarupanam nuna bhavam gotamo uccasayanamahasayananam nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti.
an3.63:4.1: “Yani kho pana tani, brahmana, uccasayanamahasayanani, seyyathidam—
an3.63:4.2: asandi pallanko gonako cittako patika patalika tulika vikatika uddalomi ekantalomi kattissam koseyyam kuttakam hatthattharam assattharam rathattharam ajinappaveni kadalimigapavarapaccattharanam sauttaracchadam ubhatolohitakupadhanam.
an3.63:4.3: Dullabhani tani pabbajitanam laddha ca pana na kappanti.
an3.63:5.1: Tini kho, imani, brahmana, uccasayanamahasayanani, yesaham etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an3.63:5.3: Dibbam uccasayanamahasayanam, brahmam uccasayanamahasayanam, ariyam uccasayanamahasayanam.
an3.63:5.4: Imani kho, brahmana, tini uccasayanamahasayanani, yesaham etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti.
an3.63:6.1: “Katamam pana tam, bho gotama, dibbam uccasayanamahasayanam, yassa bhavam gotamo etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti?
an3.63:6.2: “Idhaham, brahmana, yam gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharami, so pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya tameva gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisami.
an3.63:6.4: So yadeva tattha honti tinani va pannani va tani ekajjham sangharitva nisidami pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
an3.63:6.5: So vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharami;
an3.63:6.6: vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami;
an3.63:6.7: pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharami sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedemi, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami;
an3.63:6.8: sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharami.
an3.63:6.9: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto cankamami, dibbo me eso tasmim samaye cankamo hoti.
an3.63:6.10: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto titthami, dibbam me etam tasmim samaye thanam hoti.
an3.63:6.11: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto nisidami, dibbam me etam tasmim samaye asanam hoti.
an3.63:6.12: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto seyyam kappemi, dibbam me etam tasmim samaye uccasayanamahasayanam hoti.
an3.63:6.13: Idam kho, brahmana, dibbam uccasayanamahasayanam, yassaham etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti.
an3.63:7.2: Ko canno evarupassa dibbassa uccasayanamahasayanassa nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, annatra bhota gotamena.
an3.63:8.1: Katamam pana tam, bho gotama, brahmam uccasayanamahasayanam, yassa bhavam gotamo etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti?
an3.63:8.2: “Idhaham, brahmana, yam gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharami, so pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya tameva gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisami.
an3.63:8.4: So yadeva tattha honti tinani va pannani va tani ekajjham sangharitva nisidami pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
an3.63:8.5: So mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharami, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham, iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharami.
an3.63:8.8: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharami, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham, iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjhena pharitva viharami.
an3.63:8.9: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto cankamami, brahma me eso tasmim samaye cankamo hoti.
an3.63:8.10: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto titthami …pe…
an3.63:8.12: seyyam kappemi, brahmam me etam tasmim samaye uccasayanamahasayanam hoti.
an3.63:8.13: Idam kho, brahmana, brahmam uccasayanamahasayanam, yassaham etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti.
an3.63:9.2: Ko canno evarupassa brahmassa uccasayanamahasayanassa nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, annatra bhota gotamena.
an3.63:10.1: Katamam pana tam, bho gotama, ariyam uccasayanamahasayanam, yassa bhavam gotamo etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti?
an3.63:10.2: “Idhaham, brahmana, yam gamam va nigamam va upanissaya viharami, so pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya tameva gamam va nigamam va pindaya pavisami.
an3.63:10.4: So yadeva tattha honti tinani va pannani va tani ekajjham sangharitva nisidami pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
an3.63:10.6: ‘rago me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo;
an3.63:10.7: doso me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo;
an3.63:10.8: moho me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo’.
an3.63:10.9: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto cankamami, ariyo me eso tasmim samaye cankamo hoti.
an3.63:10.10: So ce aham, brahmana, evambhuto titthami …pe…
an3.63:10.12: seyyam kappemi, ariyam me etam tasmim samaye uccasayanamahasayanam hoti.
an3.63:10.13: Idam kho, brahmana, ariyam uccasayanamahasayanam, yassaham etarahi nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi”ti.
an3.63:11.2: Ko canno evarupassa ariyassa uccasayanamahasayanassa nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, annatra bhota gotamena.
an3.63:12.1: Abhikkantam, bho gotama, abhikkantam, bho gotama.
an3.63:12.2: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam kho bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
an3.63:12.3: Ete mayam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchama dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
an3.63:12.4: Upasake no bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupete saranam gate”ti.
